Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at 111th/Racine
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 111th & over regular route, due to street blockage near 111th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 111th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 111th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Fulton
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Washington, Austin, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Washington, Austin, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Central/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Northbound Reroute near Grand/Laramie
ShortDescription: Northbound 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Grand, Cicero, North and Laramie over regular route due to street blockage near Grand/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Grand, Cicero, North and Laramie over regular route due to street blockage near Grand/Laramie

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
